name: Pairs (words and pic)
description:
It is a game to guess the name corresponding to the emoji. It's also concentration. Aim for a fast time.

Equipped with a ranking function.

Thank you for reading and Enjoy this game！

Recommended for people like this.

: People who like hyper casual games.
: People who like short games.
: People who want to play games without paid items.
: People who don't want to play online.


Designed by Twael.
